Scripts.Text:
#define MODE var.1
#define CURRENT_EVIDENCE var.2
#define SCROLLING_DIR var.3

#define MODE_EVIDENCE 0
#define MODE_PROFILES 1

proc SelectNextEvidence GotoNext GotoPrevious
    if BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DLEFT or STICK_X <= -20
        await frames 3
        PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_LEFT
        SCROLLING_DIR = 1
        goto GotoPrevious
    elif BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DRIGHT or STICK_X >= 20
        await frames 3
        PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_RIGHT
        SCROLLING_DIR = 0
        goto GotoNext
    else
        goto SwapCheck
    endif 
endproc

proc CheckEvidenceProgress ProgressCh
    if EVIDENCE < ProgressCh
        CURRENT_EVIDENCE = -1
        if SCROLLING_DIR == 0
            goto GotoNext
        else
            goto GotoPrevious
        endif
    endif
endproc

proc ShowEvidenceMsgIfNew Msg Idx
    if CURRENT_EVIDENCE != Idx
        close_textbox
        show_textbox_sp Msg
        CURRENT_EVIDENCE = Idx
    endif
endproc

proc ShowEvidenceAttBadge Msg Idx ProgressCh GotoNext GotoPrevious

    ::ShowEvidenceMsgIfNew Msg Idx

    if BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DLEFT or STICK_X <= -20
        await frames 3
        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and EVIDENCE == EVIDENCE_START
            PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_ERROR
        else
            PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_LEFT
            SCROLLING_DIR = 1
            goto GotoPrevious
        endif
    elif BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DRIGHT or STICK_X >= 20
        await frames 3
        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and EVIDENCE == EVIDENCE_START
            PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_ERROR
        else
            PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_RIGHT
            SCROLLING_DIR = 0
            goto GotoNext
        endif
    else
        goto SwapCheck
    endif 


    return
endproc


proc ShowEvidenceMalonPhoto Msg Idx ProgressCh GotoNext GotoPrevious
    
    ::CheckEvidenceProgress ProgressCh
    ::ShowEvidenceMsgIfNew Msg Idx

    if BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_A
        CLOSE_TEXTBOX
        spawn 6
        endspawn
        await button_pressed btn_B
        kill actor_id 6
        show_textbox_sp MalonPictograph
    endif


    ::SelectNextEvidence GotoNext GotoPrevious  

    return
endproc

proc ShowEvidence Msg Idx ProgressCh GotoNext GotoPrevious

    ::CheckEvidenceProgress ProgressCh
    ::ShowEvidenceMsgIfNew Msg Idx
    ::SelectNextEvidence GotoNext GotoPrevious  

    return
endproc


CURRENT_EVIDENCE = 0
SCROLLING_DIR = 0
MODE = MODE_EVIDENCE
show_textbox_sp AttorneyBadge

set script_start SHOW_EVIDENCE


SHOW_EVIDENCE:

if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE
    if CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_ATTORNEYBADGE
        LblAttorneyBadge:
        ::ShowEvidenceAttBadge AttorneyBadge IDX_ATTORNEYBADGE EVIDENCE_START LblPictograph LblIngoClothes 
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_MALONPICTOGRAPH
        LblPictograph:
        ::ShowEvidenceMalonPhoto MalonPictograph IDX_MALONPICTOGRAPH EVIDENCE_GOTPHOTO LblAutopsy LblAttorneyBadge 
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_AUTOPSY
        LblAutopsy:
        ::ShowEvidence Autopsy IDX_AUTOPSY EVIDENCE_GOTAUTOPSY LblSaw LblPictograph
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_POACHERSAW
        LblSaw:
        ::ShowEvidence PoacherSaw IDX_POACHERSAW EVIDENCE_GOTSAW LblPerfume LblAutopsy
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_PERFUME
        LblPerfume:
        ::ShowEvidence Perfume IDX_PERFUME EVIDENCE_GOTPERFUME LblCloth LblSaw
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_BLOODYCLOTH
        LblCloth:
        ::ShowEvidence BloodyCloth IDX_BLOODYCLOTH EVIDENCE_GOTCLOTH LblOilBottle LblPerfume
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_OILBOTTLE
        LblOilBottle:
        ::ShowEvidence OilBottle IDX_OILBOTTLE EVIDENCE_GOTOILBOTTLE LblRanchInherit LblCloth
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_RANCHINHERITANCE
        LblRanchInherit:
        ::ShowEvidence RanchInheritance IDX_RANCHINHERITANCE EVIDENCE_GOTINHERITANCE LblIngoClothes LblOilBottle
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_INGOCLOTHES
        LblIngoClothes:
        ::ShowEvidence IngoClothes IDX_INGOCLOTHES EVIDENCE_GOTINGOCLOTHES LblAttorneyBadge LblRanchInherit    
    endif
else
    if CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_MALON
        LblMalon:
        ::ShowEvidence Malon IDX_MALON EVIDENCE_START LblTalon LblIngo
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_TALON
        LblTalon:
        ::ShowEvidence Talon IDX_TALON EVIDENCE_START LblJudge LblMalon   
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_JUDGE
        LblJudge:
        ::ShowEvidence Judge IDX_JUDGE EVIDENCE_GOTJUDGE LblDragmire LblTalon      
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_DRAGMIRE
        LblDragmire:
        ::ShowEvidence Dragmire IDX_DRAGMIRE EVIDENCE_GOTDRAGMIRE LblImpa LblJudge    
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_IMPA
        LblImpa:
        ::ShowEvidence Impa IDX_IMPA EVIDENCE_GOTIMPA LblZelda LblDragmire   
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_ZELDA
        LblZelda:
        ::ShowEvidence Zelda IDX_ZELDA EVIDENCE_GOTZELDA LblIngo LblImpa
    elif CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_INGO
        LblIngo:
        ::ShowEvidence Ingo IDX_INGO EVIDENCE_GOTINGO LblMalon LblZelda
    endif
endif

return

SwapCheck:

if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_R
    MODE = MODE_PROFILES
    CURRENT_EVIDENCE = 100
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_FSEL_DECIDE_L
    close_textbox
    show_textbox_sp Malon
elif MODE == MODE_PROFILES and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_R
    MODE = MODE_EVIDENCE
    CURRENT_EVIDENCE = 0
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_FSEL_DECIDE_L
    close_textbox
    show_textbox_sp AttorneyBadge   
elif BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_B
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_FSEL_CLOSE
    await frames 5
    kill self
endif
Scripts.Name: ShowEvidence

Messages.Name: AttorneyBadge
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:LIGHT_MEDALLION><G>Attorney's Badge<W>
Proof that I can stand in 
court as an attorney.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: MalonPictograph
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:PRESCRIPTION><G>Malon's Pictograph<W>
A childhood photo of Malon with 
her father. Press <A Button> to view.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Autopsy
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:ZELDAS_LETTER><G>Autopsy Report<W>
"Deep slash with a sharp object. 
Victim died from loss of blood 
around 9:30 AM."<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: PoacherSaw
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:POACHERS_SAW><G>Saw<W>
Supposed murder weapon. 
Bears no bloodstains.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Perfume
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:EYEDROPS><G>Perfume Bottle<W>
Found at the crime scene. 
Ranch's gift for the visiting 
princess.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: BloodyCloth
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:ODD_POTION><G>Bloodied Cloth<W>
Found held by Malon at the 
crime scene. Stained with blood.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: OilBottle
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:EMPTY_BOTTLE><G>Oil Bottle<W>
Found at the ranch near a 
burned-out fire. Has a tiny bit 
of oil inside.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: RanchInheritance
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:CLAIM_CHECK><G>Ranch Inheritance Document<W>
"My daughter Malon will inherit 
the ranch. If she is unable, divide 
the deed between Crown and Ingo."<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: IngoClothes
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:GORON_TUNIC><G>Ingo's Clothes<Blk>
Ingo usually wears his work clothes 
around the ranch.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Malon
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DEKU_STICK><G>Malon<W>
Age: 21
My longtime friend and the 
defendant in this case.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Dragmire
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DEKU_NUT><G>Ganondorf Dragmire<W>
Age: 57
Prosecutor assigned to the case.
Rude to others, easily angered.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Judge
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BOOMERANG><G>Judge<W>
Age: ??
Jolly old man who has presided
over some of my cases.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Impa
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BOW><G>Impa<W>
Age: 29
Homicide detective assigned to
Malon's case. A good soul.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Zelda
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BEANS><G>Princess Zelda<W>
Age: 19
Heir apparent to the royal throne.
Witnessed the murder.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Ingo
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DINS_FIRE><G>Ingo<W>
Age: 44
Smarmy man who works at
the Lon Lon Ranch.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Talon
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:SLINGSHOT><G>Talon<W>
Age: 47
Malon's father and the victim
in this case.<PERSISTENT>

#define SAVE_HEALTH save32.0x2E
#define EVIDENCE save16.0x36
GlobalHeaders.Name: Definitions

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc basic_talk textbox
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation 0
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc


proc talk_with_anim textbox talk_animation
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation talk_animation
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set animation 0
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc
GlobalHeaders.Name: Macros
